item.title: Rwanda: The Land of a Thousand Hills
item.description: They call Rwanda the land of a thousand hills, and they weren’t kidding…. It’s one of the smallest country in Africa (smaller even than most European countries, clocking in just behind Belgium), that unfortunately has one of the most devastating recent histories. The genocide of 1994, was one of the most brutal the modern world has seen and one the international community has to bear the cross for in many respects.
